Class RacingSmiley

  • java.lang.Object
    • SmileyFace
      • AnimatedSmiley
        • RacingSmiley
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RacingSmileyInterface

    public class RacingSmiley
extends AnimatedSmiley
implements RacingSmileyInterface
    Extended AnimatedSmiley that can perform in races
    Author:
    Stephen Em and Jenny Tang
